title: Where to Find Classic Key West Souvenirs

image.name: Where to Find Classic Key West Souvenirs
image.alt: Where to Find Classic Key West Souvenirs

post_content:
After enjoying an unforgettable trip to the southernmost point in the continental US, bring home a keepsake of your time in Key West. Stroll down almost any street in the downtown area and you’re sure to find a quaint gift shop filled with everything from small trinkets to beachy home decor. Read on to find the perfect Key West souvenir for you at one of our favorite shops.

Key West Shells & Gifts

628 Duval Street

The perfect place to find classic Key West souvenirs, Key West Shells & Gifts is a charming gift shop on Duval Street. Here, you can grab everything from Key West t-shirts and tote bags to shot glasses and lighthouse figurines. Key West Shells & Gifts is known for their affordable prices and friendly staff.  

The Key West Shell Warehouse

Artisans Key West

406 Duval Street

A Duval Street favorite, Artisans Key West is an unmissable stop on your tour of Key West gift shops. Artisans specializes in jewelry and home decor —  featuring top brands such as Pandora, Alex and Ani, and Swarovski — as well as locally-crafted items.
Before starting your shopping spree in Key West, fuel your day with a complimentary breakfast at Yellowfin Bar and Grille when you stay at Oceans Edge Key West.
